text: rainy days = creative boost & fabric experimentation time for me 🌧️✂️👗
cloudy skies inspire unique sketch ideas 😌📐✨

weather kinda dictates if i'm going monochrome or popping bright colors - sunny days call for bold statements plus extra motivation for work ✂️ cloudy/rainy? mellow tones & accessories cuz you've gotta keep that creative spark even when skies are dim amirite 🌧👗

haha gotta agree - nothing beats good ol' sunlight beaming through ur workspace! thumps down tho when u get screen glare ☀️😖 gotta position everything just right... makeshift sunshields are part of my workplace aesthetic at this point lol
yeah winter's tough - sticking to packed trains till sakura blooms
true - rather squeeze than slide!
always pack a fan - train rush hour ain't no joke 😓
personal space? luxury during rush hour 😂 but pro tip - master 'the lean' against train doors! saves battling elbows for a spot 🚃💨
unpredictable train delays? just call me impromptu tourist 😂🚆
nah fam, having everything sorted is overrated anyway 🤷‍♂️ embrace those curveballs life throws cuz let’s face it – nobody truly has their act together... secret’s just owning your mess tbh
once saw project budget blown on vintage kimono silk 🙊
fashion's similar but creativity bends rules no matter who you are
reconnected with sketching designs & upcycling clothes at home!
got more room to play around with bold designs & textiles now 👗✂️
time well spent crafting designs over buying stuff tbh 👌
crafts before grafts - room’s full of fabric not folks 🪡
deflecting nosy questions? go-to move = make 'em laugh with "i'm allergic to settling"
rockin’ solo lifestyle's kinda like crafting your own brand - only exhibit premiere pieces ;) why rush filling up space when every spot counts?
traditions change fam - got career & budget balancing rn 🎨💼

honestly think where we start isn't always where we grow - took active steps away from old norms back home towards something fresh even if familiar grounds gave some foundation gotta build your own thing right?
totally get it! sometimes changes sneak up on you without even realizing... like picking up bits n pieces everywhere you go 👣🌱
